page.title: 18LLANGURIG, TOURISM
page.content: The village has{two hotels}and a guest house. A{third hotel}is on the fringe of the village. All have a reputation for{good food. Llangurig is an excellent centre for {fishing}in the{Clewedog}and{Elan reservoirs, and sea fishing is available at{Aberystwyth. The craft shop provides good quality clothing and gifts made by Welsh Craftsmen. The lead mines on the Aberystwyth Road have a museum. Being in the centre of Wales, Llangurig is a{good point from which {to tour by car. There are not many walks but the scenery is worth appraising. It should be a good area for pony trekking, but none is available. For the ornithologist there is the incentive of spotting a{Red Kite.
